name: Rune 3D Mesh File
summary: Learn about .UMS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Example files in the Rune installation in the \​Meshes\​ directory are creatures.ums, objects.ums, plants.ums, Players.ums, and weapons.ums.
NOTE: Rune uses the Unreal Engine 1 technology and therefore UMS files may be similar to meshes used by other Unreal Engine 1 games.

description: File used by Rune, a a third-person action game where players control a mythological character named Ragnarok; stores the 3D geometry for a game character or object; used for providing the skeletal structure to 3D world entities.
